definition: help the starving but not the poor (idiom)
poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
see 有借有還，再借不難|有借有还，再借不难 [you3 jie4 you3 huan2 , zai4 jie4 bu4 nan2]

definition: poor and with low expectations/poverty stunts ambition
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: saving a life is more meritorious than building a seven-floor pagoda (idiom)
pinyin: jiu4 ren2 yi1 ming4 sheng4 zao4 qi1 ji2 fu2 tu2
related.word: 救人一命胜造七级浮屠

definition: to go through hell for the sake of keeping up appearances (idiom)
pinyin: si3 yao4 mian4 zi5 huo2 shou4 zui4

definition: Help others, and others may help you (idiom).
pinyin: yu3 ren2 fang1 bian4 , zi4 ji3 fang1 bian4

definition: A relative afar is less use than a close neighbor (idiom). Take whatever help is on hand, even from strangers.

definition: lit. money will make the Devil turn millstones (idiom)/fig. with money, you can do anything you like

definition: true sentiments are seen in hard times (idiom)/you see who your true friends are when you go through tough times together/you see who your true friends are when you are in difficulties
